Commands.Sneak Attack: 1-HIT BRV attack.  Doesn't miss and deals more damage when attacking an enemy not targeting Lion.  Turns to a 2-HIT BRV attack if STR 55 Passive Ability is equipped.
Commands.Powder Keg: 1-HIT BRV attack.  Inflicts Small Defense Down.  Doesn't miss and deals more damage when attacking an enemy not targeting Lion.  Turns to a 2-HIT BRV+HP attack if STR 60 Passive Ability is equipped.
Commands.BRV Attack+: 1-HIT BRV attack.  Deals more damage when attacking an enemy not targeting Lion.
Commands.Sneak Thrust: 2-HIT melee BRV+HP attack  Greatly raises damage dealt to an enemy not targeting the user  Slightly raises Attack for 1 turn  No action delay  Doesn't increase turn count  Decreases Friend Support and Summon action count
Commands.Walk the Plank: 4-HIT melee AoE BRV+HP Attack  Moderately raises BRV Damage dealt to a single target  BRV stolen can overflow up to 120% Max BRV  HP Damage is split equally amongst all enemies  Dispels all buffs from all enemies  Recovers 1 use of 「Sneak Attack」 (up to the base value)   If the previous turn was from an ally (or self), turns into 「Walk the Plank (Light)」, which adds a 4-HIT Holy magic BRV+HP Attack
